me.appfriends.sdk

Interface ChatService


  • public interface ChatService
    A service to provide messaging related functions Created by Hacknocraft LLC on 2016-12-08.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      rx.Observable<java.util.List<Message>> getMessages(java.lang.String dialogId)
      Get a list (subset) of stored messages from a dialog, will onComplete() once results are returned
      rx.Observable<java.util.List<Message>> getOlderMessages(java.lang.String dialogId, long timestamp)
      Get a list (subset) of older messages prior to a certain timestamp, will onComplete() once results are returned

      Loading receipts of a message
      int maxMessageLength()
      maximum length of a text message
      rx.Observable<Message.Type> monitorMessageSendStatus()
      Global monitoring of successful message sent events, potentially used for analytics
      rx.Observable<java.util.List<Message>> monitorNewMessages(java.lang.String dialogId)
      Continuously monitor new messages in a dialog as they are coming in, will never onComplete(), be sure to unsubscribe when monitoring is no longer needed.
      void readMessage(Message message)
      Marking a message as read by the user, this triggers read receipts to be sent to the sender of the a message.

      Sending a message to a dialog, Subscriber is not required

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        @Deprecated
rx.Observable<java.lang.Boolean> sendMessage(java.lang.String dialogId,
                                                         Dialog.DialogType dialogType,
                                                         java.lang.String body)
        Deprecated. 
        Will be removed from SDK version 3.2.0 onwards

        Use sendTextMessage(String, Dialog.DialogType, String) instead

        Sending a message to a dialog, Subscriber is not required
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        dialogType: - the type of dialog (GROUP or INDIVIDUAL)
        body: - body text of the message being sent
        Returns:
        a completing Observable of whether the message successfully send

      • sendImage

        @Deprecated
rx.Observable<java.lang.Boolean> sendImage(java.lang.String dialogId,
                                                       Dialog.DialogType dialogType,
                                                       java.lang.String imageUrl,
                                                       java.lang.String thumbnailUrl)
        Deprecated. 
        Will be removed from SDK version 3.2.0 onwards

        Use sendImageMessage(String, Dialog.DialogType, String, String) instead

        Sending a message to a dialog, Subscriber is not required
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        dialogType: - the type of dialog (GROUP or INDIVIDUAL)
        imageUrl: - image url
        thumbnailUrl: - thumbnail url
        Returns:
        a completing Observable of whether the message was successfully sent

      • sendVideo

        @Deprecated
rx.Observable<java.lang.Boolean> sendVideo(java.lang.String dialogId,
                                                       Dialog.DialogType dialogType,
                                                       java.lang.String videoStreamingUrl,
                                                       java.lang.String thumbnailUrl)
        Deprecated. 
        Will be removed from SDK version 3.2.0 onwards

        Use sendVideoMessage(String, Dialog.DialogType, String, String) instead

        Sending a message to a dialog, Subscriber is not required
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        dialogType: - the type of dialog (GROUP or INDIVIDUAL)
        videoStreamingUrl: - the video streaming url
        thumbnailUrl: - the video thumbnail image url
        Returns:
        a completing Observable of whether the message was successfully sent

      • retryFailedMessage

        @Deprecated
rx.Observable<java.lang.Boolean> retryFailedMessage(Message message,
                                                                Dialog.DialogType dialogType)
        Deprecated. 
        Will be removed from SDK version 3.2.0 onwards

        Use resendFailedMessage(Message, Dialog.DialogType) instead

        Sending a message to a dialog, Subscriber is not required
        Parameters:
        message: - the message that failed to send
        Returns:
        a completing Observable of whether the message was successfully sent

      • getMessages

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<Message>> getMessages(java.lang.String dialogId)
        Get a list (subset) of stored messages from a dialog, will onComplete() once results are returned
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        Returns:
        a non-completing Observable of list of messages in ascending order based on timestamp

      • getOlderMessages

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<Message>> getOlderMessages(java.lang.String dialogId,
                                                        long timestamp)
        Get a list (subset) of older messages prior to a certain timestamp, will onComplete() once results are returned
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        timestamp: - messages prior to the timestamp will be retrieved
        Returns:
        a completing Observable of list of messages in ascending order based on timestamp

      • monitorNewMessages

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<Message>> monitorNewMessages(java.lang.String dialogId)
        Continuously monitor new messages in a dialog as they are coming in, will never onComplete(), be sure to unsubscribe when monitoring is no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        Returns:
        a non-completing Observable of list of messages coming in ascending order based on timestamp

      • sendTextMessage

        rx.Completable sendTextMessage(java.lang.String dialogId,
                               Dialog.DialogType dialogType,
                               java.lang.String body)
        Sending a message to a dialog, Subscriber is not required
        Parameters:
        dialogId: - id of the dialog
        dialogType: - the type of dialog (GROUP or INDIVIDUAL)
        body: - body text of the message being sent
        Returns:
        a Completable of whether the message was successfully sent

      • monitorMessageSendStatus

        rx.Observable<Message.Type> monitorMessageSendStatus()
        Global monitoring of successful message sent events, potentially used for analytics
        Returns:
        a non-completing Observable of when a specific type of message has been sent

      • getReadReceipts

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getReadReceipts(java.lang.String messageTempID)
        Loading receipts of a message
        Parameters:
        messageTempID: - id of the message
        Returns:
        a completing Observable of the list of user ids who have replied with receipts
